name: Lorelei

ski.name: TRAILING PETALS
desc: Lorelei scatters out her explosive petals, dealing magical damage and slowing their movement speed by 15% for 2s.

ski.name: FLORAL BURST
desc: Lorelei conjures abundance at a target area, sprouting flowers after a short interval to deal damage to and slowdown movement for affected enemy units. Flowers provide field of vision for 3s.
study: Deals damage, slows movement speed and gain the vision

ski.name: GLORIOUS BEAUTY
desc: Lorelei enters her harvest bounty state for 15s, strengthening her next ability cast to produce extra effects._Trailing Petals: deals bonus attack damage._Floral Burst: causes Stun to affected targets, while denying healing for a short period._Disc of Protection: shield increases movement speed of ally heroes, while hoop damages enemies.
data: Beauty Flower: Damage targets` Health by 5%/8%/11% in addition every time
Pure Flower: Stun 1/1.5/2s and force enemies not to restore Health within 5s.
Enchanting Flower: Increase Movement Speed by 50/70/90 for 3s and cause Magical Damage of 150/200/250

ski.name: DISC OF PROTECTION
desc: Lorelei hurls out her wrist hoop and then recovers it, granting a shield that absorbs damage to ally heroes that it touches.
study: Cast a ring and add a shiled

story: As light as the eclipsed moon, Lorelei, the goddess of  water, was as radiant as the sunrise.
